description: This table contains predicted next destination service groupers for pend (PND) records based on predictive models.

columns.name: PEND_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the pended entry record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PRED_SVC_GRP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The predicted next destination service groupers for pending event records based on predictive models.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PRED_SVC_CONF_NUM
columns.description: The percent confidence from the predictive model for each of the predicted next destination service groupers.
